report.title: Redetermined images
report.description: For the cron task that corrects the taxon a redetermined image is linked to.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN determinations d ON d.occurrence_id=o.id and d.deleted=false JOIN occurrence_media oi ON oi.occurrence_id=o.id and oi.deleted=false JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttlwas on cttlwas.id=d.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttlis on cttlis.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id WHERE o.website_id=8 AND d.id>#last_det_id# AND cttlwas.external_key<>cttlis.external_key AND oi.external_details='Copied to Drupal' AND cttlwas.external_key<>''
